page.title: 08EDUCATION
page.content: A Secondary school pupil is not yet taught by computers but by adults. The adults must have a degree in the subject they are teaching. However, many of the existing teachers do not have a degree. The subjects available to be studied in this school are:- Maths,English,French,Spanish,German, Latin,Geography,History,Art,Religious Education,Chemistry,Biology,Physics, and Crafts. Project Technology is also avalaible in the 4th year onwards. We are only allowed to opt for five subjects from this list excluding Maths and English (literature and language) which are compulsory. For this reason many of the pupils are restricted as career problems may stop them doing Computer Studies and other practical subjects.
